channel.title: Characters on MillMint
channel.description: Recent content in Characters on MillMint

item.title: Characters
item.description: ß· This article is about Hobart’s characters, who live in Vekllei A lthough almost all characters in this project were born in Vekllei, they are of vastly different heritages and backgrounds. A study of modern Vekllei is a study of immigration. Most characters here have swirling ethnic, religious and cultural histories aiding and obscuring their destinies. This is useful, because if you’re following along with this project, you’re in some small way an immigrant yourself.
